title: What is Mesmeric Crisis? /  Non-Verbal Hypnosis / Dr. Marco Paret
description:
Dr Paret will explain what is mesmeris crisis and why crises are helpful. You will  also see a compilation of some powerful crises induced by dr Paret and his students. The Mesmeric Crises are always beneficial and liberating.

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
